title: Enhancing Leadership Competency: Mobile Collaboration for Scientific Task Resolution: Online Discussion-Based Micro-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can refine perspectives continuously in three online discussion assignments and propose scientific problem-solving solutions
Learners can expand discussion depth by implementing perspective-shifting (expression→refinement) patterns at least twice in collaboration with team members
Learners can self-assess cognitive engagement levels in collaborative processes through formative assessments conducted at least three times weekly in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
